name: Luminate
description:
Hey guys, this is a game I spent a lot of hours working on.  I have been making games for awhile now but I believe this is my best one yet. The purpose of this game is to Dodge the enemy's while on a timer. Any Feedback would be great and thank you for playing my game.

Controls:
WASD/Arrow Keys = Movement
SPACE = Jump
ESC = Menu

Sound Design: Serjan 

  • https://www.facebook.com/serjanofficial/?ref=br_rs
  • https://soundcloud.com/serjan
  • https://www.instagram.com/serjanmusic/
